p: The obtained data demonstrated that the 3,4-dihydro-2(1 H)-pyridone amphiphiles ( Table 2) with a pyridinium polar head group and introduced fluorine atoms in the ester moiety (comp. 31 and comp. 32) were substantially more cytotoxic to tested cells than the structurally related 1,4-DHP amphiphiles 23 and 24.
